report.title: Species & occurrence counts by user 2
report.description: Lists users and the number of species and occurrences entered by each of them, filtered to multiple surveys or locations for the survey summary module.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN users u on u.id=o.created_by_id and u.id<>1 WHERE (o.zero_abundance='f' OR o.id IS NULL) AND #website_filter# AND ('#survey_ids#'='0' OR o.survey_id in (#survey_ids#)) AND ('#location_ids#'='0' OR o.location_id in (#location_ids#)) AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Select the surveys, or leave for all surveys

param.name: location_ids
param.description: Select the locations, or leave for all locations

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating the current user.

column.name: me
column.sql: case cast(u.id as character varying) when '#currentUser#' then 'me' else 'other' end
